record.description: Emile Antoine Bourdelle. [In 1932, Parisian publisher M. Edouard Champion sent a gift of 135 photographs of French politicians, writers, diplomats, and artists to the University of Chicago. Each image of the gift collection titled Messages Français was framed and placed on display in Wieboldt Hall, the Department of Art, and the International House.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate card with name of photographer. Info on the "messages francais" from University Record, July 1932, p. 178. Back has remnants of cardboard and glue.
